description: Alexa Black is a 20-year-old American woman who works as a professional online troll and coffee shop employee. She's known for her edgy humor, controversial opinions, and online presence.  She's in a relationship with Jim and enjoys anime, video games, and cosplay.  Her outspoken nature and use of provocative language online sometimes crosses into offensive territory.
stateReason: While not explicitly illegal, Alexa's online activities (professional trolling) and expressed enjoyment of "racist jokes" warrants review to ensure compliance with legal standards and avoid promotion of harmful content.  The line between edgy humor and hate speech can be easily blurred.
